title: realme C31 (Light Silver, 32 GB)  (3 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adapter, USB Cable, Sim Card Tool, Screen Protect Film, Case, Important Info Booklet with Warranty Card, Quick Guide
product_specification.Other Display Features: 60 Hz Refresh Rate, Aspect Ratio: 20:08, Screen-to-Body Ratio: 88.70%, Screen Contrast: 1500:1, 400 nits Brightness, Color Saturation: 70%, Supports Sunlight Screen
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 13MP Main Camera (Sony IMX258-0AUH5-C, f/2.2 Aperture, FOV: 81.3 Degree, 24.85mm Focal Length, 5P Lens, 1/3.06 Sensor Size, 1.12um Pixel Size, Auto Focus) + 2MP Macro Camera (One for Galaxycore GC02M1 and Two for OV: OV02B10, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV: 88.8 Degree, 21.88mm Focal Length, 3P Lens, 1/5 Sensor Size, 1.75um Pixel Size, Fixed Focus) + 0.3MP Black & White Lens (One for Sibike SP0A09 and Two for BYD BF20A1, f/2.8 Aperture, FOV: 60 Degree, 36.14mm Focal Length, 2P Lens, 1/10 Sensor Size, 2.2um Pixel Size, Fixed Focus), CMOS, Camera Feature: Mode, Burst, Filter, Timelapse, Pro, Panorama, Macro, Night Pro, Portrait, HDR), 20 Continuous Shots
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 5MP Camera Setup: (One for Hynix Hi-556D and Two for Geke Micro GC5035, f/2.2 Aperture, FOV: 76.6 Degree, 1/5 Sensor Size, 1.12um Pixel Size, 3P Lens, Fixed Focus), CMOS, Camera Feature: HDR, Beauty Mode, Face Recognition, Filter
product_specification.Flash: Rear: Single Flash | Front: Screen Flash
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps), 480p (at 30 fps)| Front: 480p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.User Interface: Realme UI R Edition (Based on Android 11)
product_specification.Sensors: Magnetic Induction Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyro-meter, Acceleration Sensor
product_specification.Other Features: 120Hz Touch Sampling Rate, COG Sealing Process, Incell Touch Screen, 10 Touch Points, Taking Photos Methods: Timer, Touch, Volume Button, Smiley, Dual RAM Channel, RAM Frequency: 1600 MHz, UFS 2.2 ROM, Dual ROM Channel, 10W Charging Power, Reverse Charging, 1 x 1 Wi-Fi Antenna Technology, 2 x 2 MIMO RF Antenna Technology, Bluetooth Audio Codec: SBC, AAC, LDAC, Phone Locked Functions: Face Unlock, Fingerprint Unlock, Password Unlock, Pattern Unlock, Google Smart Lock, Side Fingerprint, Wet Fingerprint Unlock, 2D Face Unlock Technology, Private Protection, OTG Storage Format: FAT32, 1 Microphone, Vibrating Motor Type: Flat Motor, 1 Speaker, L3 Level WideVine Supported, Press to Answer Calls, Wake Up Voice Assistant, Switch the Music, Headphones Monitor, Night Shield, Step Tracker, APP Market, Clone Phone, Google Lens, Data Backup, Office Tools, World Time, Import and Export Messages, Import and Export Contacts, Back Cover Material - PC, Glass Type - Panel Corning CG Panda, Rainbow, Web Video Play Supported
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, APE, FLAC, AMR, MIDI, MP3, OGG, WAV, WMA, MKA
product_specification.Video Formats: MP4, 3GP, ASF, AVI, FLV, M2TS, MKV, MPG, TS, WEBM, WMV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty for Phone and 6 Months Warranty for In-Box Accessories

product_description.13 MP Triple Camera: The realme C31 brings an unmatched photographic function with an incredible performance that simply blows you away. With a 13 MP triple camera set-up powered by AI, you can create visual masterpieces seamlessly and up your photography game.
product_description.Powerful Processor: Powered by an Octa-core processor , the performance delivered by this smartphone is powerful and you can flawlessly enjoy the smooth operation and quick responsiveness, thereby getting substantial amounts of work done in a short span.
product_description.Multi-slot Advantage: This smartphone comes with two SIM card slots and a microSD card slot that facilitates boosted network availability and enables you to enjoy vast storage experience.
product_description.Robust Battery: Thanks to the 5000 mAh battery boasted by the realme C31, it offers a splendid battery life of up to one month on standby mode. You can enjoy watching movies and playing games relentlessly without worrying about the battery being depleted.
product_description.Selfie Sensation: With the 5 MP selfie camera, this phone quenches all your selfie cravings by capturing crystal-clear selfies with enthralling imagery.
product_description.Sleek Slayer: Measuring over 8.4 mm and with improved internal design, the realme C31 offers specialised grip and elegant appearance, thus making you gain all the spotlight wherever you go.
product_description.Dynamic Texture Design: This smartphone sports a Dynamic Texture Design that ensures a cinematic visual experience and a delightful interface at the same time.
product_description.Tested and Trusted: The realme C31 surpasses all the quality tests and delivers a sturdy and durable performance for a long period of time.
